items.title: 忘记预订 iPhone 17 了？大多数门店今天仍可到店取货 (原标题: Forgot to Pre-Order iPhone 17? Apple Store Pickup Available Today at Most Locations)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
# iPhone 17 系列发布：预订延迟，但多数门店今日可到店取货

## 发布与预订情况
*   **发布日期：** 2025年9月19日（星期五），苹果新款iPhone 17、iPhone Air、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max型号已开始向全球客户发货。
*   **预订开始：** 2025年9月12日（星期五）。
*   **预订延迟：** 对于未预订或选择等待的客户，美国及其他地区的苹果在线商店许多配置面临额外1-3周的发货延迟，预计交货时间推迟到9月下旬至10月中旬。

## 到店取货选项
*   **当日取货：** 在发售日当天，部分Apple Store门店仍提供到店取货或送货选项。
*   **美国和加拿大：** 截至撰写本文时，美国和加拿大的苹果在线商店尚未更新显示取货可用性，某些配置可能存在短缺，但各州情况可能有所不同。
*   **欧洲地区：** 法国、德国、意大利、西班牙和英国等国家的Apple Store门店，所有iPhone 17颜色和配置均可在今日或明日到店取货。
*   **其他地区：** 澳大利亚、中国、印度、日本、马来西亚、墨西哥、韩国、土耳其和阿联酋的Apple Store门店也提供当日取货选项。

## 如何预订到店取货
1.  在Apple.com或Apple Store应用中将产品添加到购物袋。
2.  前往结账页面，选择“我将到店取货”选项。
3.  输入邮政编码，选择一个可用的Apple Store门店。
4.  选择取货日期和15分钟的签到时间段。
5.  在线完成支付。
6.  取货时可能需要提供有效的政府颁发带照片的身份证件和订单号。

## 现场购买
*   **库存情况：** 如果库存充足，到店顾客也可能购买到iPhone 17型号，但无法保证。
*   **排队：** 现场顾客抵达门店时可能会被安排到优先级较低的单独队列中。

## iPhone 17 系列型号概览

### iPhone 17
*   **芯片：** A19芯片，支持Apple Intelligence。
*   **显示屏：** 优秀的OLED显示屏，支持120Hz ProMotion刷新率和全天候显示功能。
*   **摄像头：** 双镜头摄像头系统，配备两个4800万像素镜头。
*   **其他特性：** 苹果设计的网络芯片，更耐刮擦的正面玻璃，用于快速访问摄像头的“相机控制”按钮，以及一个可自定义的“操作”按钮。
*   **起售价：** 799美元。

### iPhone Air
*   **设计：** 苹果新款超薄iPhone，厚度仅5.6毫米，是其产品线中最薄的手机。
*   **定位：** 取代“Plus”型号，尺寸介于iPhone 17和Pro型号之间。
*   **显示屏：** 6.5英寸ProMotion 120Hz显示屏。
*   **材质：** 采用5级钛金属机身，正面和背面均采用第二代超瓷晶面板，提供更好的抗刮擦和抗裂性。
*   **摄像头：** 单个4800万像素后置摄像头，正面配备1800万像素原深感摄像头系统。
*   **内部配置：** 搭载A19 Pro芯片，12GB RAM。
*   **连接性：** 通过新的苹果设计调制解调器（C1X）升级网络和连接性，仅支持eSIM。
*   **起售价：** 999美元。

### iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max
*   **定位：** 苹果新款旗舰型号。
*   **设计：** 采用轻质铝材，以实现更好的散热管理；全新药丸状后置“摄像头平台”，内置三颗4800万像素摄像头系统，支持先进的8倍长焦变焦、LiDAR和专业级视频工具。
*   **显示屏：** 更亮的120Hz ProMotion显示屏，户外亮度可达3000尼特，改进了抗反射涂层和全天候显示功能。
*   **性能：** 搭载A19 Pro芯片和均热板散热系统，提供更快的设备端AI性能和更强的持续速度。
*   **连接性：** 支持Wi-Fi 7、蓝牙6、Thread、仅eSIM支持和USB-C（USB3速度）。
*   **电池续航：** Pro Max型号电池续航时间长达39小时。
*   **充电：** Qi 2.2 25W快速充电和MagSafe增强功能。
*   **存储：** 256GB起步，Pro Max最高可达2TB。
*   **Pro型号起售价：** 1099美元。

![iPhone 产品线价格](https://images.macrumors.com/t/JbM7bMqkVeGa515_guqjrXC--JI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-lineup-prices.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果新款iPhone 17系列（包括iPhone 17、iPhone Air、iPhone 17 Pro和Pro Max）已于9月19日发售。尽管预订用户面临1-3周的配送延迟，但全球多数Apple Store门店今日仍提供到店取货服务。顾客可通过苹果官网或App预订取货，或尝试现场购买。iPhone 17起售价799美元，iPhone Air 999美元，Pro型号1099美元起，各型号均有显著升级。
items.translated_title: 忘记预订 iPhone 17 了？大多数门店今天仍可到店取货
items.content:
Apple's new iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max models are now being delivered to customers worldwide following the pre-order period that began on Friday, September 12. For those who didn't pre-order or chose to wait, many configurations on Apple's online store in the U.S. and elsewhere are facing an additional 1-3 week shipping delay beyond launch day, with delivery estimates pushing into late September to mid-October. However, delivery or in-store pickup at select Apple Store locations on launch day is still an option.


As of writing, Apple's online stores in the United States and Canada haven't yet been updated to show pickup availability, but there could be shortages for some configurations, though there could be some variation state by state. Meanwhile across the pond, all ‌iPhone 17 colors and configurations are available for Apple Store pickup either today or tomorrow in countries including France, Germany, Italy, Spain, and the United Kingdom. Apple Stores in Australia, China, India, Japan, Malaysia, Mexico, South Korea, Türkiye, and the UAE are also offering same-day pickup options.

To order a product with ‌Apple Store‌ pickup, add the product to your bag on Apple.com or in the ‌Apple Store‌ app, proceed to checkout, select the "I'll pick it up" option, enter your ZIP or postal code, choose an available ‌Apple Store‌ location, select a pickup date, and select a 15-minute check-in window. Payment is completed online, and a valid government-issued photo ID and the order number may be required upon pickup.

‌iPhone 17 models may also be available for walk-in customers at ‌Apple Store‌ locations with sufficient inventory, but availability can't be guaranteed. Walk-in customers may be placed into a separate queue with lower priority upon arrival to the store.

The iPhone 17 has an A19 chip that supports Apple Intelligence, an excellent OLED display with a 120Hz ProMotion refresh rate and Always-On functionality, a dual-lens camera system with two 48-megapixel lenses, an Apple-designed networking chip, more scratch resistant front glass, a Camera Control button for quick camera access, and a customizable Action button. Pricing starts at $799.

The iPhone Air is Apple's new ultra‐thin iPhone, measuring just 5.6mm thick, making it the slimmest phone in its lineup. It replaces the "Plus" model and sits between the iPhone 17 and the Pro models in size with a 6.5-inch ProMotion 120Hz display. Its body is built with grade 5 titanium, with Ceramic Shield 2 on both front and back, giving better scratch and crack resistance. It's got a single 48MP rear camera, while the front has an 18MP TrueDepth system. Internally, it's powered by the A19 Pro chip, along with 12 GB RAM. Networking and connectivity are upgraded via new Apple‐designed modem (C1X), and it's eSIM-only. The iPhone Air starting price is $999.

The iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max are Apple's new flagship models, built with lightweight aluminum for better heat management and featuring a new pill-shaped rear "camera plateau" housing a triple 48MP camera system with advanced 8× telephoto zoom, LiDAR, and pro-grade video tools. Both offer brighter 120Hz ProMotion displays reaching 3,000 nits outdoors, with improved anti-reflective coatings and always-on functionality. Powered by the A19 Pro chip with vapor chamber cooling, they deliver faster on-device AI performance and stronger sustained speeds. Connectivity includes Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6, Thread, eSIM-only support, and USB-C with USB3 speeds. Battery life stretches up to 39 hours on the Pro Max, while Qi 2.2 25W fast charging and MagSafe enhancements improve daily use. Storage starts at 256GB and extends to 2TB on the Pro Max, with Pro prices from $1,099.

Click the tags at the bottom of this article for all the details.

items.title: 排名：iOS 26 最有用的 10 项功能 (原标题: Ranked: The 10 Most Useful iOS 26 Features)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26 最有用的 10 项功能概览

iOS 26 带来了约 200 项新功能和改进，本文重点介绍了其中最能提升 iPhone 使用体验的更新。

## 核心实用功能

*   **垃圾信息过滤**
    *   iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS 26 能够过滤垃圾短信、电话和 FaceTime 通话，包括垃圾语音邮件。
    *   所有被 Apple 设备识别为垃圾或诈骗的内容都会被过滤到一个用户无需查看的垃圾邮件文件夹中。
    *   ![iOS 26 消息过滤](https://images.macrumors.com/t/u7U5teOeKxjYzDOO7FD1O9wP9IU=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-messages-filtering.jpg?lossy)
*   **来电筛选**
    *   当接到未知号码的来电时，来电筛选功能会询问对方姓名和来电原因，并将信息转达给用户，以便决定是否接听。
    *   用户还可以在接听前要求更多信息。如果用户愿意，仍然可以选择完全静音未知号码的来电。
    *   ![iOS 26 电话应用来电筛选](https://images.macrumors.com/t/n_K7vGCvK6c6GzoOzZdPerjvlyM=/400x0/article-new/2024/11/ios-26-phone-app-screening.jpg?lossy)
*   **锁屏小组件底部放置**
    *   小组件现在可以放置在显示屏底部，不再局限于时钟下方。这一小改动对于希望看到更多壁纸内容的用户非常实用。
    *   结合可调节的时间大小，当壁纸定期更换时，时间和小组件位置可以动态调整以适应图像。
    *   ![iOS 26 锁屏底部小组件](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ibMaJxPHTpq9UopCUXj52FDRnDk=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-bottom-widgets-lock-screen.jpg?lossy)
*   **可隐藏的导航栏**
    *   在 Safari、Apple Music、Apple News、播客等应用中滚动时，标签栏会缩小，以便用户查看更多内容。
    *   在 Safari 中尤其有用，用户只会看到一个带有网站 URL 或搜索词的小条，没有额外的控件阻碍视线。点击标签栏或向上滚动即可恢复控件。
    *   ![iOS 26 Safari 菜单折叠](https://images.macrumors.com/t/aHc16FOj63xJGT9Bja9MVEe7GR4=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-safari-menu-collapsed.jpg?lossy)
*   **屏幕视觉智能**
    *   用户可以直接在屏幕内容上使用视觉智能，比通过相机激活更方便。截屏后点击即可访问设备上的视觉智能控制。
    *   可以总结截屏内容、翻译、朗读，或向 ChatGPT 提问，或在 Google、Etsy 等网站上搜索物品。
    *   ![iOS 26 视觉查找](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TAxNLC58qhvWM0cAvRJF3tz07GY=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/visual-lookup-ios-26.jpg?lossy)
*   **语音邮件摘要**
    *   Apple Intelligence 可以总结语音邮件并提供文字记录，让用户无需收听即可了解内容。
    *   ![iOS 26 语音邮件报告垃圾信息](https://images.macrumors.com/t/8ZwznhJgbtDepxAxHIaiOgyiOMo=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-voicemail-report-spam.jpg?lossy)
*   **信息应用文本复制改进**
    *   信息应用中终于可以选择只复制文本的一部分，而不是整个消息。长按文本并点击“选择”即可使用拖放控件，然后点击复制。
    *   ![iOS 26 信息选择复制粘贴](https://images.macrumors.com/t/GI-_uEULyQydGLvPyfXke_LKod4=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ios-26-messages-select-copy-paste.jpg?lossy)
*   **自定义闹钟小睡时长**
    *   在时钟应用中设置闹钟时，现在可以选择 1 到 15 分钟的小睡时长，不再局限于 9 分钟。
    *   ![iOS 26 闹钟小睡时长](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Dot5RaybCSsDi9UT9OH4MmM2v3g=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/alarm-snooze-duration-ios-26.jpg?lossy)
*   **信息应用实时翻译**
    *   可以为任何对话开启实时翻译，获取非用户语言文本的实时翻译。支持英语（美国、英国）、法语（法国）、德语、意大利语、日语、韩语、葡萄牙语（巴西）、西班牙语（西班牙）和简体中文。
    *   电话应用和 FaceTime 也支持实时翻译，FaceTime 使用翻译的实时字幕，电话应用使用 AI 语音。
    *   ![iOS 26 信息实时翻译](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Ot83v5g8qGprz-H4ZzITn-Nzx2E=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/messages-ios-26-live-translation-2.jpg?lossy)
*   **信息应用背景**
    *   可以为个人或群组对话选择自定义背景，该背景对所有参与者可见。
    *   此外，信息应用还增加了过滤选项、投票支持、群聊打字指示器以及群聊中的 Apple Cash 转账支持等实用功能。
    *   ![十项信息功能](https://images.macrumors.com/t/9XJY2LSI3OigERIuYd5UE2uE5jo=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ten-messages-features.jpg?lossy)
*   **图像游乐场和 Genmoji**
    *   可以将两个或更多表情符号组合成新的表情符号，为创作新角色提供更好的起点。
    *   情绪主题的表情符号可以用于 Genmoji 和图像游乐场创作，以实际添加情感。
    *   iOS 26 改进了基于家人和朋友照片生成的图像质量，并支持付费 ChatGPT 计划的完整 ChatGPT 图像生成功能。
    *   ![iOS 26 Genmoji](https://images.macrumors.com/t/UiYvWPta3AGAtk57BH9lzr68Zhk=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ios-26-genmoji.jpg?lossy)

## 其他实用新增功能

*   **密码应用**：显示密码历史记录。
*   **电池界面**：监测平均电池使用情况，并与日常使用进行比较，帮助识别耗电应用。
*   **充电时间**：插入充电器或 MagSafe 充电器时，点击屏幕可查看充满电所需时间。
*   **照片应用**：现在有一个“照片图库”标签和一个“收藏”标签，改进了 iOS 18 统一照片应用的体验。
*   **AutoMix (Apple Music)**：歌曲过渡的节拍匹配功能，效果良好。
*   **电话应用 SharePlay**：无需 FaceTime 通话即可在观看电视、玩游戏或听音乐时与他人聊天。
*   **地图“到访地点”**：记录用户去过的地方，方便记住喜欢的商店或餐厅（测试版功能）。
*   **DualSense 控制器配对**：通过 USB-C 线缆即可连接 DualSense 控制器到 iPhone 或 iPad。

## 潜力巨大但有待改进的功能

*   **钱包订单追踪**：理论上可追踪非 Apple Pay 订单，但目前表现不佳，依赖邮件信息且常有滞留。
*   **预览应用**：界面混乱，与文件应用和标记功能有重叠。
*   **游戏应用**：最新尝试推广 Game Center 功能，但本质上是 App Store 游戏部分的复制。
*   **提醒事项**：建议提醒和自动分类功能有潜力，但准确性有待提高。
*   **快捷指令**：支持 Apple Intelligence，但创建过程对普通用户仍过于复杂。
*   **保持辅助**：在等待电话接通时提供辅助，但可能被背景音乐或语音提示干扰。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 引入了多项提升用户体验的实用功能。主要亮点包括：垃圾信息和来电的智能过滤、来电筛选、锁屏小组件的灵活放置、应用内可隐藏的导航栏、屏幕视觉智能、语音邮件摘要、信息应用中部分文本复制、自定义闹钟小睡时长、信息应用实时翻译、个性化信息背景以及改进的图像游乐场和 Genmoji。此外，还有密码历史、电池使用监控、照片应用优化等小改进，部分功能如钱包订单追踪和提醒事项仍有待完善。
items.translated_title: 排名：iOS 26 最有用的 10 项功能
items.content:
iOS 26 has somewhere around 200 new features and changes, some of which are more useful than others. We've highlighted some of the updates that we think provide the best quality of life improvements to the iPhone.


Spam Filtering


‌iOS 26‌, iPadOS 26, and macOS 26 filter out spam text messages, so you'll no longer get alerts for fake toll payments, suspicious job offers, missed deliveries, tax refunds, and other common scams.


Spam phone calls and FaceTime calls also won't come through, and that includes spam voicemails. Everything spam or scam related that your Apple devices catch is filtered into a spam filter that you never have to look at.

Call Screening


When you get a call from an unknown number, Call Screening will ask the person for their name and reason for calling. That information is relayed to you so you can decide whether to pick up or not.


You can also ask for more information from a caller before you ever pick up. There's still an option to silence calls from unknown numbers entirely if you prefer.

Adjustable Lock Screen Widgets


Widgets on the Lock Screen can be placed at the bottom of the display, and are no longer limited to placement just below the clock. It's a small change, but it's useful if you want to see more of your wallpaper.


It plays into the adjustable time size too, because if you have your wallpaper set to change regularly, the time and widget position can change dynamically to accommodate the artwork or image.

Disappearing Navigation Bars


When you scroll in Safari, Apple Music, Apple News, Podcasts, and more, the tab bar will shrink down to be smaller, so you can see more of the content that you're looking at.


It's especially useful in Safari, where you'll just see a tiny bar with the site URL or search term, with no extra controls in the way. Tapping the tab bar or scrolling back up returns the controls. Navigation bars that collapse down are one of the best Liquid Glass changes, and it's the kind of intuitive thing that feels like it should have always existed.

On-Screen Visual Intelligence


You can use Visual Intelligence with content on your display, which is more useful than ‌Visual Intelligence‌ activated through the Camera. Just take a screenshot and tap it to get to the on-device ‌Visual Intelligence‌ controls.


You can summarize what's in your screenshot, translate it, or have it read aloud. You can also ask ChatGPT questions about it or search for an item on Google, Etsy, and other sites.

What ‌Visual Intelligence‌ does can be accomplished in other ways since there's web-based summary and translate features and the option to simply search for items with Google Images or open ChatGPT, but it saves time once you get used to grabbing a screenshot and tapping into ‌Visual Intelligence‌.

Voicemail Summaries


Apple Intelligence can summarize your voicemails and provide transcripts so you can see what someone had to say without having to listen to a voicemail.


Copying Messages Text


There is FINALLY an option to copy just part of a text in the Messages app rather than the whole thing. If you've ever needed to copy a phone number, address, URL, or something similar from a message but couldn't single out exactly what you wanted, you'll appreciate this small but useful feature.


Long press on a text and tap "Select" to get drag and drop controls, then tap on copy. It's not the most intuitive flow, but at least the option exists.

Customize Snooze Duration


You can now choose a snooze duration between 1 minute and 15 minutes when setting an alarm in the Clock app, so you're no longer limited to a nine minute snooze period.


Unfortunately, this change was accompanied by a design change that makes the snooze button enormous, so you might be more prone to sleepily snoozing longer than expected.

Messages Live Translation


Live Translation is a little niche if you're not regularly chatting with people who speak another language, but it comes in handy. You can turn on Live Translation for any conversation and get real-time translations for texts that aren't in your language.


It works well, but it is limited to English (U.S., UK), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish (Spain), and Chinese (simplified), so there isn't support for every language you might encounter.

There are also Live Translation features for Phone and ‌FaceTime‌. ‌FaceTime‌ uses translated live captions, and the Phone app uses an AI voice, which is a little bit weirder than text-based translation.

Message Backgrounds


Technically not the most useful feature, but it's on the list because Apple is finally embracing more customization. You can choose a custom background for any single person or group conversation, but keep in mind that the background is displayed for everyone.


More useful Messages features include filtering options, support for polls, typing indicators for group chats, and Apple Cash support for sending money in a group chat.

Image Playground and Genmoji


This is at the bottom of the list and is technically an honorable mention, but Apple did implement changes that make Image Playground and Genmoji more useful. Two or more emoji can be combined to create a new emoji, which makes for a better jumping off point than a blank slate if you want to create a new character.


More importantly, emotion-themed emoji can be used for ‌Genmoji‌ and ‌Image Playground‌ creations to actually add emotion. Apple's image generation tools have a very hard time portraying even basic emotion like happy, sad, and mad, limiting their usefulness. It's a little better in ‌iOS 26‌.

If you haven't checked out ‌Image Playground‌ in ‌iOS 26‌, it could be worth a look. Apple did a good job improving the images that are generated based on images of your family and friends, plus it supports the full ChatGPT image generation capabilities if you have a paid ChatGPT plan.

Other Useful Additions


There are other handy changes that didn't make the list, but deserve a mention.

  • Passwords - The Passwords app shows your password history, so you can see the previous passwords that you used for a given login.

  • Battery UI - Apple now monitors battery life in averages, comparing your daily usage to your average usage. You can see at a glance if you're using more battery than normal, and which apps are causing battery drain. It's more helpful than just straight battery usage statistics.

  • Time to Charge - You can see how long it'll be until your ‌iPhone‌ charges to full if you tap on the display while it's plugged into a charger or on a MagSafe charger.

  • Photos - If you hated that unified iOS 18 Photos app, you'll like the ‌iOS 26‌ version better. It has one tab for the Photo Library and one tab for Collections.

  • AutoMix - ‌Apple Music‌'s AutoMix feature for song transitions works well, and the beat matching is neat. It isn't available for all genres and there are some songs where it could be better, but it's a great new option.

  • SharePlay for the Phone app - You don't need to be on a ‌FaceTime‌ call to chat while doing things like watching tv, playing a game, or listening to music with someone.

  • Maps Visited Places - If you travel a lot, Visited Places can keep track of where you've been. It's good for remembering a favorite store or restaurant. It doesn't always log every visit and sometimes it isn't spot on for locations, but it's still a beta feature and even when imperfect, it's useful.

  • DualSense Controller Pairing - This takes a firmware update, but you can connect a DualSense controller to an ‌iPhone‌ or iPad just by plugging it in with a USB-C cable.


Potentially Useful, But Disappointing


There are some features in ‌iOS 26‌ that have a lot of potential, but that need improvement.

  • Wallet order tracking - The Wallet app can in theory track any order you place even if it's not an Apple Pay purchase, but it's not great right now. It pulls order and shipment emails from the Mail app, so if you don't get an email with every step of the order process, the item just sits in a list in the Wallet app until you clear it out. Apple does say this feature is in beta, and for good reason.

  • Preview app - The Preview app is just kind of confusing. The interface is odd because it pops up the Files app and buttons for creating a new document, and it doesn't open automatically when you do something like tap a PDF in the Files app. The interface is too similar to Files, and there's overlap with Markup, which still exists.

  • Games - Apple has tried several times to make Game Center features more popular, and the Games app seems like the latest attempt. It has multiplayer game support and options to challenge friends to beat your score in single player games, but it's really just a copy of the Games section of the App Store.

  • Reminders - Reminders has a Suggest Reminders feature that Apple says can do things like pull ingredients from a recipe in Safari. It can, kind of, but it needs to be better at it. Auto-categorize also has the potential to be useful, but it doesn't always get things right.

  • Shortcuts - Shortcuts supports ‌Apple Intelligence‌, and ‌Apple Intelligence‌ models can be integrated directly into your creations, but shortcuts are still too complicated for the average user. ‌iOS 26‌ hasn't improved the shortcut creation process.

  • Hold Assist - Hold Assist holds for you so you can do other things while waiting for someone to get on the line. It's useful, but if the place you're calling has music with lyrics or one of those please stay on the line voice reminders, it can trip up Hold Assist.


Wrap Up


Do you agree with our ‌iOS 26‌ feature ranking? What do you think are the most useful new additions in ‌iOS 26‌? Let us know in the comments below.

items.title: 苹果在新广告中推广 iPhone 17 Pro (原标题: Apple Promotes iPhone 17 Pro in New Ad)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果在新广告中推广 iPhone 17 Pro

随着 iPhone 17 系列机型在澳大利亚和新西兰上市，苹果公司在其澳大利亚 YouTube 频道上发布了一则新的 iPhone 17 Pro 广告。这则广告预计很快也会在苹果的其他 YouTube 频道上发布。

### 广告亮点与 iPhone 17 Pro 特性：
*   **广告内容**：广告中，一位电影导演在各种恶劣、混乱的条件下（如泥泞和雪地）使用 iPhone 17 Pro 进行拍摄，展示了该设备的耐用性和专业拍摄能力。
*   **摄像头系统**：iPhone 17 Pro 配备了三镜头摄像头系统，每个镜头均为 48 兆像素。
*   **长焦镜头**：新增的长焦镜头提供 4 倍和 8 倍光学变焦选项。
*   **专业电影制作功能**：苹果为专业电影制作人添加了新功能，并在视频描述中宣称 iPhone 17 Pro 拥有苹果有史以来“最具电影感的摄像头”。

## 热门故事回顾

除了 iPhone 17 Pro 的推广，文章还提到了近期的一些热门新闻：

### iOS 26 更新相关：
*   **电池续航影响警告**：苹果在 iOS 26 发布说明中警告用户，安装新软件可能会暂时影响电池续航。这是正常现象，因为主要 iOS 更新需要进行后台设置，如数据和文件索引、下载新资源以及更新应用程序。此外，新功能可能需要更多系统资源。
*   **AirPods 固件更新**：AirPods Pro 2 和 AirPods 4 获得了新的固件更新（版本号 8A356），以支持 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS Tahoe 中包含的新 AirPods 功能，包括提升通话音频质量。
*   **iOS 26.1 至 26.4 预期功能**：iOS 26 发布后，iOS 26.1 的首个开发者测试版预计将很快发布。文章指出，去年 iOS 18.1 的首个开发者测试版发布较早（7 月底）是为了提前测试 Apple Intelligence 功能，而 iOS 15.1、16.1 和 17.1 的首个测试版通常在 9 月下旬发布。
*   **iOS 26 “液态玻璃”设计引争议**：iOS 26 发布两天后，其全新的“液态玻璃”设计引发了比预期更大的争议。MacRumors 论坛、Reddit、苹果支持社区和社交媒体上出现了更多批评而非赞扬的声音。
*   **iOS 26 百大新功能**：苹果于 9 月 15 日发布了 iOS 26，适用于所有兼容的 iPhone 用户。新系统带来了许多变化和功能，包括“液态玻璃”设计，该设计能反射光线并折射其下方内容，并应用于系统范围内的动态标签栏和工具栏。
*   **iOS 26 锁屏自定义功能**：iOS 26 为 iPhone 锁屏带来了新的更改和功能，用户可以在“设置”>“通用”>“软件更新”中下载并体验这些新功能。

### 苹果未来产品计划：
*   **未来数月将推出 10 款产品**：据彭博社的马克·古尔曼报道，在 iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max、iPhone Air、Apple Watch Series 11、Apple Watch Ultra 3、Apple Watch SE 3 和 AirPods Pro 3 于 9 月 19 日发布之后，苹果计划在“未来数月”内推出更多产品。
items.shortSummary: 苹果在其澳大利亚 YouTube 频道发布了 iPhone 17 Pro 的新广告，展示了该手机在恶劣条件下（如泥泞和雪地）的专业拍摄能力。iPhone 17 Pro 配备三颗 48 兆像素镜头，新增 4 倍和 8 倍光学变焦长焦镜头，被誉为苹果“最具电影感的摄像头”。此外，文章还提及了 iOS 26 更新可能影响电池续航、AirPods 固件更新、iOS 26“液态玻璃”设计引发争议以及苹果未来数月将推出多款新产品的计划。

items.title: Meta发布AI眼镜 (原标题: Meta Launches AI Glasses)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
Meta发布了其新款AI眼镜，名为Meta Ray-Ban Display AI眼镜，售价800美元起。这款智能眼镜于2025年9月18日发布，并计划于9月30日上市。

![meta ai glasses](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kLIauGbG6_bSCwS8AoS6MmivbBc=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/meta-ai-glasses.jpg?lossy)

**主要特点：**

*   **独立操作能力：** 用户无需智能手机即可查看消息、浏览照片并与Meta AI进行交互。
*   **显示技术：**
    *   配备全彩、高分辨率的单目显示屏，具有定制的光引擎和模块，提供清晰的对比度和高亮度。
    *   每度视野包含42像素。
    *   显示屏位于侧面，避免遮挡视线，且并非常亮设计，主要用于短时交互。
*   **硬件配置：** 内置摄像头、麦克风和扬声器。
*   **控制方式：**
    *   通过Meta Neural Band腕带进行控制。
    *   腕带能解读肌肉活动产生的信号，实现微妙的手部动作来操控眼镜功能，类似于Apple Vision Pro的控制方式。
*   **设计与舒适度：**
    *   外观酷似Ray-Ban Wayfarer，但镜腿更粗。
    *   提供黑色和沙色两种颜色，以及标准和大号两种尺寸。腕带也有三种尺寸。
    *   所有版本均配备Transition镜片，适用于室内外。
    *   边缘更圆润，正面略带弧度，以减少眩光并提高舒适度。
    *   采用钛合金铰链以减轻重量，眼镜总重69克。
*   **电池续航：**
    *   眼镜本身续航6小时，配合充电盒可延长至30小时。
    *   Neural Band腕带续航18小时。
*   **AI功能与应用：**
    *   Meta AI可提供问题答案和分步操作指南。
    *   支持短信和视频通话。
    *   具备相机取景器和变焦功能，用于拍照。
    *   提供无需手机的步行导航和音乐播放选项。
    *   支持实时字幕（Live Captions），可实时翻译其他语言的语音。

**价格与上市：**
Meta Ray-Ban Display AI眼镜起售价800美元，包含Meta Neural Band腕带。Meta还提供线下演示，供有意购买者体验。
items.shortSummary: Meta发布了其新款Meta Ray-Ban Display AI智能眼镜，售价800美元起，将于9月30日上市。这款眼镜集成了全彩显示屏、摄像头、麦克风和扬声器，无需智能手机即可与Meta AI交互、收发消息、拍照和导航。它通过配套的Meta Neural Band腕带，利用微妙手势进行控制。眼镜设计时尚，配备Transition镜片，续航可达30小时（带充电盒），并支持实时翻译等多种功能。
items.content:
Meta this week unveiled $800 smart glasses that include an in-lens display. The new Meta Ray-Ban Display AI glasses allow you to check messages, view photos, and interact with Meta AI without the need to use a smartphone.


There is a full-color, high-resolution display included in the glasses, along with cameras, microphones, and speakers. Meta says that the included monocular display has a custom light engine and custom module that provides sharp contrast and high brightness. There are 42 pixels in each degree of the field of view.

Meta placed the display off to the side to prevent it from obstructing the view through the glasses, and the display is also not designed to be on constantly. It is meant for short interactions.

The AI glasses are meant to be used with the Meta Neural Band, a wristband that interprets signals created by muscle activity to navigate the features of the glasses. With the band, you can control the glasses with subtle hand movements, similar to how Apple Vision Pro control works.

Meta is offering the glasses in black and sand, and they are designed to look like Ray-Ban Wayfarers, but with a thicker temple arm. There two available sizes, including a standard size and a large size, and the band comes in three sizes. All versions of the glasses include Transition lenses, allowing them to be used both indoors and out.

https://t.co/ow6HaIL2Ei pic.twitter.com/Ki3aniKSaD

— Mark Gurman (@markgurman) September 18, 2025

Meta says the glasses have more rounded edges than the Wayfarers, along with a slight curve at the front to reduce glare and improve comfort. There are titanium hinges to minimize weight, and the glasses weigh in at 69 grams.

The AI glasses have a six hour battery life, but that can be extended to up to 30 hours with an included charging case. The Neural Band has an 18-hour battery life.

Meta says that Meta AI can show wearers answers and step-by-step how tos, with the glasses also able to handle text messaging and video calling. There are camera viewfinder and zoom features for taking photos, along with phone-free walking directions and options for listening to music. Live Captions are available for translating speech in other languages in real-time.

The Meta Ray-Ban Display is priced starting at $800, with the Meta Neural Band included. The glasses will be available starting on September 30. Meta is offering in-person demos for those who want to purchase the AI glasses.
Tag: Meta

items.title: iPhone Air MagSafe 电池包使用与 iPhone Air 相同的电池 (原标题: iPhone Air MagSafe Battery Pack Uses Same Battery as iPhone Air)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### iPhone Air MagSafe 电池包拆解发现

*   **主要发现：** iFixit 拆解 iPhone Air MagSafe 电池包后发现，其内部电池的形状异常，推测苹果可能在 iPhone Air 和 iPhone Air MagSafe 电池包中使用了相同的电池。
*   **电池规格：**
    *   容量：12.26Wh
    *   厚度：2.72mm，足以装入 5.6mm 厚的 iPhone Air。
    *   外观：与苹果在介绍新设备时展示的 iPhone Air 电池非常相似，甚至可能相同。
*   **充电限制：** 尽管可能使用相同电池，iPhone Air MagSafe 电池包只能将 iPhone Air 充电至 65%，这归因于无线充电过程中的能量传输损耗。
*   **电池包设计：**
    *   厚度：比 iPhone Air 更厚，iFixit 推测这是作为可行产品所需的最小尺寸。
    *   保护：内部电池由塑料保护，不具备 iPhone Air 的钛金属框架。

### 其他相关新闻（文章中提及）

*   **iOS 26 对电池续航的影响：** 苹果警告用户，安装 iOS 26 可能会暂时影响电池续航，这是正常现象，因为系统需要进行后台设置（如数据索引、文件搜索、下载新资源和更新应用）。
*   **AirPods 固件更新：** AirPods Pro 2 和 AirPods 4 获得了新的固件更新（版本号 8A356），支持 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS Tahoe 中的新 AirPods 功能，包括更好的通话音质。
*   **iOS 26.1 至 26.4 预期新功能：** 尽管 iOS 26 已发布，但 iOS 26.1 的第一个开发者测试版预计将很快发布，后续版本也将带来更多新功能。
*   **iOS 26“液态玻璃”设计争议：** iOS 26 的“液态玻璃”设计引发了用户两极分化的评价，MacRumors 论坛、Reddit 等平台出现大量批评声音。
*   **苹果未来产品计划：** 彭博社的 Mark Gurman 透露，苹果计划在“未来几个月”推出多款产品，包括 iPhone 17 系列、iPhone Air、Apple Watch Series 11、Apple Watch Ultra 3、Apple Watch SE 3 和 AirPods Pro 3。
*   **iOS 26 主要功能和变化：** iOS 26 于 9 月 15 日发布，带来了大量新功能和设计变化，包括系统范围的“液态玻璃”设计、动态标签栏和工具栏等。
*   **iOS 26 锁屏自定义功能：** iOS 26 为 iPhone 锁屏带来了新的自定义功能和改进。
items.shortSummary: iFixit 拆解 iPhone Air MagSafe 电池包发现，其内部电池可能与 iPhone Air 本身使用的电池相同，容量为 12.26Wh，厚度 2.72mm。尽管电池相同，但由于无线充电能量传输损耗，该电池包只能将 iPhone Air 充电至 65%。电池包比 iPhone Air 更厚，内部电池有塑料保护，但没有钛金属框架。
items.translated_title: iPhone Air MagSafe 电池包使用与 iPhone Air 相同的电池
items.content:
iFixit today took apart the iPhone Air MagSafe Battery pack, an accessory designed to work exclusively with the ‌iPhone Air‌, and discovered something interesting.


The battery inside the accessory has an unusual shape, leading iFixit to conclude that it's possible that Apple is using the same battery for the ‌iPhone Air‌ and the ‌iPhone Air‌ ‌MagSafe‌ Battery.

iFixit compared the battery in the ‌MagSafe‌ Battery pack to the ‌iPhone Air‌ battery that Apple showed off when introducing the new device, and it does appear to be a close match if not identical.

The battery has a 12.26Wh capacity, and it is 2.72mm thick, which means it is thin enough to fit inside the 5.6mm ‌iPhone Air‌.

The ‌iPhone Air‌ ‌MagSafe‌ Battery pack is only able to charge an ‌iPhone Air‌ to 65 percent even though it appears Apple is using the same exact battery that's in the iPhone, but that's due to energy transfer loss during wireless charging.

The ‌iPhone Air‌ ‌MagSafe‌ Battery is thicker than the ‌iPhone Air‌, and iFixit speculates that the size was the minimum needed to make it a viable product. The battery inside is protected with plastic and it does not have the same titanium frame as the ‌iPhone Air‌.
Tag: iFixit

items.title: 首批iPhone Air、iPhone 17和iPhone 17 Pro订单已送达客户 (原标题: First iPhone Air, iPhone 17, and iPhone 17 Pro Orders Now Arriving to Customers)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### 首批iPhone Air、iPhone 17系列及其他新品订单开始送达

2025年9月18日，随着澳大利亚和新西兰进入9月19日星期五，当地的Apple客户已开始陆续收到他们预订的最新Apple产品。这标志着新一代iPhone和Apple Watch的全球发货正式启动。

#### 首批送达产品包括：

*   **iPhone系列**：iPhone Air、iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max
*   **其他设备**：AirPods Pro 3、Apple Watch Series 11、Apple Watch Ultra 3、Apple Watch SE 3

![iPhone Air的纤薄](https://images.macrumors.com/t/9YgfwzDIVCcs5hcYu9wAX46zLac=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-air-thinness.jpg?lossy)

#### 客户反馈与零售情况：

*   预计Apple粉丝们将很快在Instagram、Reddit和MacRumors论坛等社交媒体上分享他们新设备的开箱照片和初步使用体验。
*   新西兰没有Apple零售店，因此澳大利亚的客户是首批能够到Apple Store门店取货或直接购买新设备的用户。澳大利亚的门店库存情况将为全球其他Apple门店提供参考。
*   **预订情况**：iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max在预订期间已售罄，目前在线发货预计将推迟到10月份。
*   **零售店供货**：尽管在线预订紧张，但预计零售店将有充足的供应。错过预订的客户仍有望在Apple Store或Target、Walmart、Best Buy等大型零售商处购买到新iPhone。

#### 全球发货计划：

在澳大利亚和新西兰之后，新iPhone 17系列及其他设备的销售和交付将陆续在亚洲、中东、欧洲展开，最后抵达北美地区。全球部分Apple Store门店将提前至当地时间上午8:00开门，方便客户领取预订设备并进行现场购买。

MacRumors将持续关注，并将在近期发布新设备的上手体验、开箱视频，以及对设计、摄像头和功能集的深入评测。
items.shortSummary: 首批iPhone Air、iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max订单已开始送达澳大利亚和新西兰的客户。同时，AirPods Pro 3和多款Apple Watch新品也同步发货。iPhone 17 Pro/Pro Max在线预订已售罄，但零售店预计仍有供应。全球发货将逐步扩展至亚洲、中东、欧洲和北美。MacRumors将提供后续评测和开箱内容。
items.translated_title: 首批iPhone Air、iPhone 17和iPhone 17 Pro订单已送达客户
items.content:
Apple customers in Australia and New Zealand are starting to receive their iPhone Air, iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max orders, since it is already Friday, September 19 in those two countries.


Orders of the AirPods Pro 3, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and Apple Watch SE 3 are also arriving.

Apple fans who ordered a new device will soon be sharing photos and first impressions of the new ‌iPhone 17‌ models on Instagram, Reddit, the MacRumors forums, and other social networks. If you've received one of the new devices, let us know in the comments below and share pictures and your initial thoughts.

There are no Apple retail stores in New Zealand, so customers in Australia are the first to be able to pick up their new devices or make a purchase in an Apple Store. In-store stock in Australia will provide insight into what we can expect at other Apple locations around the world.

The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ and ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max did sell out during the pre-order period, and online shipping estimates are now into October. We are expecting retail stores to have available supply though, so if you missed pre-ordering, you should be able to get a new iPhone from Apple or from another big box retailer like Target, Walmart, or Best Buy.

After Australia and New Zealand, sales and deliveries of the new ‌iPhone 17‌ models and the other devices will begin in Asia, the Middle East, Europe, and finally, North America. Some Apple Stores worldwide are opening early at 8:00 a.m. local time to allow customers to pick up reserved devices and make walk-in purchases.

Stay tuned to MacRumors, because we'll have hands-on and unboxing videos tomorrow, plus deep dives into the design, cameras, and feature sets of the new devices.
